name: music-selector
description: A fullstack web application that creates Spotify playlists from CSV files with a Tinder-like song selection interface

scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.dev:ngrok: echo 'üåê Starting with ngrok (HTTPS)...' && echo '1. Run: npm run ngrok (in new terminal)' && echo '2. Update Spotify redirect URI' && echo '3. Then run: npm run dev' && echo ''
scripts.clean: rm -rf server/dist && rm -rf client/build && rm -rf server/node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules
